languages.text: {n}Абеляр одобрительно кивает.{/n} "Благоразумное стремление, Лорд-капитан. Готов посвятить вас во все интересующие вас нюансы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр одобрительно кивает.{/n} "Благоразумное стремление, Лорд-капитан. Готов посвятить вас во все интересующие вас нюансы".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard nods approvingly.{/n} "A noble aspiration, Lord Captain. I am ready to acquaint you with all the particulars that interest you."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德赞许地点点头。{/n}“这是个崇高的决定，舰长大人。我愿意帮助您了解您所有感兴趣的细节。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods approvingly.{/n} "A noble aspiration, Lord Captain. I am ready to acquaint you with all the particulars that interest you."

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods approvingly.{/n} "A noble aspiration, Lord Captain. I am ready to acquaint you with all the particulars that interest you."

languages.text: {n}Abelard asiente con aprobación.{/n} «Una meta muy noble, Lord Capitán. Estoy listo para informarle de cualquier particular que pueda interesarle».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods approvingly.{/n} "A noble aspiration, Lord Captain. I am ready to acquaint you with all the particulars that interest you."

languages.text: {n}アベラルドも賛同してうなずく。{/n}「崇高な志といえましょう、ロード・キャプテン。関心のあることは、何でもお教えいたします」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods approvingly.{/n} "A noble aspiration, Lord Captain. I am ready to acquaint you with all the particulars that interest you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドも賛同してうなずく。{/n}「崇高な志といえましょう、ロード・キャプテン。関心のあることは、何でもお教えいたします」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard nickt wohlwollend.{/n} "Ein edles Ansinnen, Lord Captain. Ich bin bereit, Euch mit allen Details vertraut zu machen, die Euch interessieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods approvingly.{/n} "A noble aspiration, Lord Captain. I am ready to acquaint you with all the particulars that interest you."

languages.text: {n}Abélard approuve d'un signe de tête.{/n} « Une noble aspiration, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis prêt à vous renseigner sur tout ce qui pourrait vous intéresser. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods approvingly.{/n} "A noble aspiration, Lord Captain. I am ready to acquaint you with all the particulars that interest you."

languages.text: {n}Abelard başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Asil bir düşünce Lord Kaptan. İlginize layık tüm ayrıntıları sizinle paylaşmaya hazırım."
